_comment: ↓↓List of labels that will be added to the trigerring pull request
↓↓List of users from which the code will try to pick, such that the reviewer isn't also the author of the commits
↓↓Backup reviewer will be assigned to a pull request, if NO reviewer from reviewerPool can be assigned
↑↑This is an optionall setting, if left as 'null' it will not take affect
↓↓These messages will be shown in respective situations:
selfReviewed:
This is an automated message:
It seems that this pull request is only self-reviewed.
notReviewed:
This is an automated message:
It seems that this pull request is not reviewed at all.
_comment: ↓↓This message will be additionaly shown in all situations, if an appropriate reviewer can be designated
↑↑This messages will also contain '@assigned_reviewer' ping at the beggining
↓↓Or this message will be additionaly shown, if NO appropriate reviewer can be designated
noReviewer: No appropriate reviewer from the reviewer pool can be assigned. Backup reviewer will be assigned, if they are designated
_comment: ↑↑Optionally, this message can contain '@backup_reviewer' ping at the beggining
↑↑Backup reviewer can be designated at the begginging of this file
